description: List lineup scenario trailer lineup job schedule shifts with filtering and pagination.

flags.description: Filter by lineup scenario trailer ID
flags.name: --lineup-scenario-trailer

flags.description: Filter by lineup scenario lineup job schedule shift ID
flags.name: --lineup-scenario-lineup-job-schedule-shift

permissions: User must be an admin or a member of the broker that owns the related lineup scenario (access is scoped via the lineup scenario associated to the trailer and shift).
